de.ityx.ocr.ocrservice.vocr.service

Class VOCRTrainerServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.ocr.ocrservice.vocr.service.VOCRTrainerServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VOCRConfigurationService, VOCRTrainerService

    @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_VOCR\')")
public class VOCRTrainerServiceImpl
extends Object
implements VOCRTrainerService, VOCRConfigurationService

      • addDocument

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED,
               rollbackFor=java.lang.Throwable.class)
public VOCRTrainset addDocument(String profile,
                                                              String uri,
                                                              VOCRTrainset[] trainsets)
        Description copied from interface: VOCRConfigurationService
        Add documents to the internal document repository. This method takes the same document ocred by different engines as an array. It is merged inside the implementation and the merged result will be returned. The uris of all trainsets must be identical and must match the uri argument, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown. If the document already exists it updates the existing document.
        Specified by:
        addDocument in interface VOCRConfigurationService
        Parameters:
        profile - The name of the VOCR profile.
        uri - The uri/uri of the ocred document.
        trainsets - An array of trainsets. Each trainset must contain one and only one engine and must represent the same document.
        Returns:
        The merged trainset.

      • updateDocument

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED,
               rollbackFor=java.lang.Throwable.class)
public void updateDocument(String profile,
                                                         String uri,
                                                         VOCRTrainset trainset)
        Description copied from interface: VOCRConfigurationService
        Update a merged document that has been changed. Unlike addDocument(), this method does not perform any merging. The updated trainset must already be merged.
        Specified by:
        updateDocument in interface VOCRConfigurationService
        Parameters:
        profile - The name of the VOCR profile.
        uri - The uri/uri of the ocred document. This uri must already exist in the document repository.
        trainset - The updated trainset.

        Description copied from interface: VOCRConfigurationService

      • exportConfiguration

        @Transactional(readOnly=true,
               propagation=REQUIRED,
               rollbackFor=java.lang.Throwable.class)
public String exportConfiguration(String profile)
        Description copied from interface: VOCRConfigurationService
        Export the VOCR configuration identified by profile. THe configuration will be serialized into a xml string. If the given profile contains no model or more than one model (instances of VOCRModel), no model is included in the export.
        Specified by:
        exportConfiguration in interface VOCRConfigurationService
        Parameters:
        profile - The VOCR profile that should be exported.
        Returns:
        A (XML-)String representing the configuration for a specific vocr configuration.

      • importConfiguration

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED,
               rollbackFor=java.lang.Throwable.class)
public void importConfiguration(String xml)
        Description copied from interface: VOCRConfigurationService
        Import the VOCR configuration identified by profile. Tee configuration will be deserialized from a xml string and saved to the database under the name/profile it was saved. If the configuration does not contain a VOCR model, a new model must be created.
        Specified by:
        importConfiguration in interface VOCRConfigurationService
        Parameters:
        xml - A (XML-)String representing the configuration for a specific vocr configuration.

      • getModelAccuracies

        @Transactional(readOnly=true,
               propagation=REQUIRED,
               rollbackFor=java.lang.Throwable.class)
public Map<String,Double> getModelAccuracies(String profile)
        Description copied from interface: VOCRTrainerService
        Returns for the given profile a map containing the accuracies for each single OCR engine and the VOCR engine. The accuracies are within the range [0, 1]. The VOCR engine is identified with the key VOCRTrainer.VOCR_NAME, i.e., VOCR. An empty map is returned if no model accuracies can be found for the given profile. An IllegalStateException is thrown if no or more than one model is persisted in the database.
        Specified by:
        getModelAccuracies in interface VOCRConfigurationService
        Specified by:
        getModelAccuracies in interface VOCRTrainerService
        Parameters:
        profile - The VOCR profile the model accuracies should be retrieved from.
        Returns:
        a Map containing the accuracies of all single OCR engines and the VOCR engine.
